channel.title: Workshops on Selenium
channel.description: Recent content in Workshops on Selenium

item.title: Let's meet at SeleniumConf, Once Again!
item.description: This year is special, thanks to the decision to host an in-person conference after a long hiatus and several years of virtual-only events. We’ve gone out of our way to reflect this feeling at the conference. We have engrossing keynotes, well-researched talks, hands-on pre-conference workshops, hallway tracks, and whatnot! Here’s a quick list of what to expect! What’s cooking in Keynotes? We have Diego Molina kicking things off with ‘Selenium: State of the Union’ where he will talk about all things Selenium, including the project, the code, and the community.
